short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for setting todos on tabs using the chunking method.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chunky Tabs Chrome extension helps you manage your tasks in a more organized and efficient way by allowing you to 'chunk' them together in various categories.  You can create tasks form the Chrome Browser and associate the current tabs you are using with the tasks.  

When you want to work on completing the tasks, you can launch the 'chunk' of the tasks you want to work on, and the extension will create a separate window with all the associated tabs.  It's easy!

How Does This Help You?
* Focus on related tasks at a time
* Minimize the cons of multi-tasking
* More clarity on what needs to get done
* Group the resources needed to accomplish your tasks quickly
* Gain insight on what really needs to get done by identifying urgency, difficulty, and long term importance
* Reduce distractions
